artist: After Hubert François Gravelot; Jean-Baptiste Lebas (Maître in 1756)
description: four pyramids in background; man in center holding tablet; man reclining in front; two mummy cases on ground LL; cat, child and sphinx shaped container behind; below pyramids a reclining man with beard and scepter;  flying horse upper right; goat on rock center right; man below rock holding smoking vessel

title: Antiquities of Egypt
